title: [Large-Scale] Mathematical Self-Empowerment Program through Proactive Coaching and Mentoring

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in taking college-level mathematics courses
context.additional_context: Online real-time course focusing on strengthening self-directed learning competencies through coaching and improving mathematical problem-solving skills, applying a large-scale system integrating peer interaction and mentor feedback

learning_goals: Learners can improve their self-efficacy in solving math problems by 30% or more within six months.
Learners can form a habit of voluntarily inquiring with mentors about learning at least once a week by the third month.
By the end of the course, learners can specifically describe three or more strengths and areas for improvement identified through reflective journals.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
